Text.Page:
I've made a remarkable discovery. The sprouts of the Casian Tree possess tremendous restorative properties.

Please help me collect some. It might prove helpful in treating wounded soldiers.

This will be enough. I don't want to take more than we can immediately use for fear of damaging the tree.

Your assistance is, as always, most appreciated.
The sprouts aren't hard to find. In fact, there's one over there.
